original: Lantz, Karl Ernst, redaktör, Växjö, f. 18/12/02 i Kristinehamn av disp. E. A. Lantz o. Kristina Aronsson. G. 29 m. Lillie Lindberg. Barn: Margareta f. 30, Karl Magnus 34. — Realex. 21. Anst. v. Karlstads Mek. Verkst. i Kristinehamn 16-19, medarb. i Värml. Folkblad i Karlstad 24-33, red. o. ansv. utg. av Skaraborgaren i Falköp. 33-44, dito av Kronobergaren i Växjö sed. 44. Medl. av lOGT sed. 17, verkat som talare inom rör., förste v. distr :templar i Kronob. distr., medl. av Soc:demokr. arb :part. sed. 18, ordf. i SSU Värml :-distr. 24-27, sekr. i partiets Skarab :-distr. 33-42, stadsfullm. i Karlstad 31-33, i Falköp. 35-44, led. eller ordf. i flera kommun, inst. o. ndr i Karlstad o. Falköp.
translated: Lantz, Karl Ernst, editor, Växjö, b. 18/12/02 in Kristinehamn to parents E. A. Lantz and Kristina Aronsson. Married on 29th, married to Lillie Lindberg. Children: Margareta b. 30, Karl Magnus b. 34. Completed secondary education in 1921. Employed at Karlstads Mek. Verkst. in Kristinehamn from 1916 to 1919, collaborator at Värml. Folkblad in Karlstad from 1924 to 1933, editor and responsible publisher of Skaraborgaren in Falköping from 1933 to 1944, and the same for Kronobergaren in Växjö since 1944. Member of the Independent Order of Good Templars since 1917, has served as a speaker within the organization, first vice district temperance leader in Kronoberg district, member of the Social Democratic Workers' Party since 1918, chairman of SSU Värmland district from 1924 to 1927, secretary in the party's Skaraborg district from 1933 to 1942, city council member in Karlstad from 1931 to 1933, in Falköping from 1935 to 1944, member or chairman of several municipal institutions and others in Karlstad and Falköping.
